description: Try our easy to follow Tomato & Goat's Cheese Tartlets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Canapés,Seafood free,Low salt,Christmas,Tree nut free,Egg free,Tomato,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Tomato & Goat's Cheese Tartlets Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 sheet ready-rolled puff pastry, partially thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Lightly grease 2 x 8 hole patty pan tins.
Cut pastry into 16 squares. Place a square of pastry into each prepared hole. Divide cheese between each pastry square. Top with tomato halves. Season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until pastry is golden and tomatoes are soft.
Transfer to a wire rack to cool.
Serve warm or cold, topped with basil leaf.
